basics.name: Jiachen Guo
basics.label: PhD Candidate in Theoretical and Applied Mechanics
basics.summary: Self-motivated researcher with expertise in Machine Learning, Numerical Simulation and Computational Science. Adept at Deep Learning, Optimization, Large-scale Data Analysis, and Fast reduced-order modeling of physics. Skilled in software development for computational science, emphasizing efficient algorithms and robust design.

work.name: HIDENN-AI, LLC
work.summary: LLM-driven Computational Science: Proposed and developed a novel framework for scientific code generation using a RAG-based approach on a specialized surrogate model database, reducing development cycles by 40%. Physical AI Model Development: Invented and validated AI-enhanced machine learning model, INN-TD, for ultra large-scale physical world modeling with much less training data, significant speedup, better accuracy and fast inference. AI Education in Computational Science: Led 4 sessions in the 2025 HiDeNN-AI summer course, educating over 40 participants including graduate students and industry professionals on advanced AI for computational science.

work.name: Northwestern University
work.summary: Ultra Large-scale Surrogate modeling of complex physics: Architected and implemented a novel surrogate model using Tensor Decomposition (TD), accelerating large-scale PDE simulations by over 100x while drastically reducing RAM and storage requirements. GPU-Accelerated Scientific Computing: Implemented the tensor decomposition method in JAX GPU for ultra large-scale additive manufacturing physical process simulations. Novel Operator Learning Method: Proposed novel operator learning framework on clustered data and validated the method using microscale analysis in computational mechanics. ML for Scientific Discovery: Developed data-driven physical law discovery using dimensionless learning that successfully discovered hidden physics from additive manufacturing experimental data.

work.name: Shanghai Municipal Engineering Design Institute Co., Ltd
work.summary: Data analysis: Designed, built, and maintained a scalable data pipeline for infrastructure inspection data.
